name: coffea
description: event based and extensible irc client library with multi-network support
author: Caffeinery Developers <daniel.bugl@touchlay.com>

scripts.coverage: ./node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli.js cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec test/* && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
